# Open Analytics Resources for Health and Care {#intro}

Originally a [Google document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/15unzokDyUQR_YLWFqBwVvds3C6B69sZn_3OQro9gB3E/edit#) is supported by the [Association of professional Healthcare Analysts (ApHA)](https://www.aphanalysts.org/), [This Equals](http://thisequals.co.uk/) and [Keyah Consulting](https://keyahconsulting.com/), in collaboration with the [Health Foundation](https://health.org.uk/), released under a CC-BY-SA licence. Attributions to ApHA 2020. This document is still active.

This document is a resource for analysts and data scientists working in the health and care sectors.

## Technical notes 

This {bookdown} is available for review, curation, comment and update from anyone who wishes to do a pull request or an [issue](https://github.com/Lextuga007/open-analytics-resources/issues). Using GitHub means this is version controlled, is backed up and is available to everyone.

Translation from the Google document was via a copy to a personal account and the use of the Google Add-On for turning docs to markdown.
